title: Veigar with no items, obliterating peoples health bars????
body: Is this like, a thing he can do? Does he naturally get a lot of AP per lvl or smth? Or is dmg really that snowbally and broken even on a champ with no items?

replies.body:
Veigar is a very binary champion, he requires the enemy to somewhat outplay themselves in many cases (not all). If he lands a stun on you, you either

A. Weren't paying attention (fuck I do this when I play against Veigars so it's easy to relate)
B. He caught you off guard where you didn't have vision
C. You tried to dash out of it or walked through it on accident. 

He's alot like Nasus, except easier to kill than Nasus. He can and will farm to the point where he is a threat to your squishies, but unlike Nasus, Veigar is made of Papier-mâché and can be instapopped unless he has Zhonyas. 

As Veigar I absolutely hate it when the enemy {{item:3157}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3139}}  Because it means I'm going to have a very very bad time. Even with a massive amount of AP it's very hard to one rotation an enemy adc who went {{item:3139}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3812}}  Because it's hard to stun them, thus it's hard to land a solid Q and almost impossible to land a W without the stun. And contrary to popular belief, no Veigar cannot one shot with his ult anymore, it's now an execute style spell that does more damage the less health you have Capping at 30 or 40% I can't remember the exact number. 

And a good support can make Veigar useless aswell with {{item:3222}} WHICH IS A FANTASTIC ITEM AND I'M NOT SURE WHY MORE PEOPLE DON'T' BUILD IT MORE OFTEN. 

But in conclusion Veigar is just a very very very squishy version of Nasus, except Nasus can still pump out more damage quicker than Veigar late game because fuck you that's why.

See this is very helpful, thank you.
Passive gives him one AP everytime he hits a Champ, 5 per takedown (kill or assist), and 1-2 for killing foes with Q (depending on size).
Veigar's passive gives him AP every time he kills an enemy with his Q, or hits/kills an enemy champ.
